章节结构

  • 常用符号：

    = - ` : . ' " ~ ^ _ * + #

  • 所有可用符号：

    ! " # $ % & ' ( ) * + , - . / : ; < = > ? @ [ \ ] ^ _ ` { | } ~

Transition

Transition 符号由4个或以上 章节结构 里允许用的符号组成，都会被渲染成水平线。如下面的水平线是由 #### 渲染成的。

Topic 结构

Topic Title Example

这是 topic 第一段。

这是 topic 的第二段。

topic 结构一般用在文章开头，或某段开头，或是 transition 开始时，用于点明主题。上面这个 topic 的例子的原文为：

.. topic:: Topic Title Example

   这是 topic 第一段。

   这是 topic 的第二段。

rst 常用语法

常见样式

*倾斜*

**加粗**

``inline literal``

注释由两个点加空格起头，渲染后不会显示：

.. 这里是注释，将不会被显示。

倾斜

加粗

inline literal

注释由两个点加空格起头，渲染后不会显示：

 
- 直接使用网址，以http或https起头：

  http://yongchen.org

- 用文字表示链接 I：

  `my site <http://yongchen.org>`_

- 用文字表示链接 II：

  `my site`_

  .. _my site: http://yongchen.org

- 所有的章节标题都可以被引用：

  `章节结构`_

  • 直接使用网址，以http或https起头：

    http://yongchen.org

  • 用文字表示链接 I：

    my site

  • 用文字表示链接 II：

    my site

  • 所有的章节标题都可以被引用：

    章节结构

 
The |Nikola| image is shown here.

.. |Nikola| image:: /images/nikola.png
            :align: middle
            :width: 30 (网页中我们常用480)

``image`` 中的 ``align`` 选项可以是 ``top``,
``middle``, ``bottom``.

另外，比 ``image`` 功能更强大，``figure`` 可以包括
（也可省略）标题和图例。
``align`` 可以是 ``left``, ``center``, ``right``.

.. figure:: /images/nikola.png
   :align: center
   :figwidth: 300

   This is the caption of the figure. 标题只能有一段。

   所有出现在标题段之后的文字和其它内容都视为图例。
   例如这一段文字以及下面的表格：

   +-----------------------+-----------------------+
   | Symbol                | Meaning               |
   +=======================+=======================+
   | .. image:: tent.png   | Campground            |
   +-----------------------+-----------------------+
   | .. image:: waves.png  | Lake                  |
   +-----------------------+-----------------------+
   | .. image:: peak.png   | Mountain              |
   +-----------------------+-----------------------+

文字，图片等对象的替代 (substitution) :

The image is shown here.

image 中的 align 选项可以是 top, middle, bottom.

另外，比 image 功能更强大，figure 可以包括 （也可省略）标题和图例。 align 可以是 left, center, right.

This is the caption of the figure. 标题只能有一段。

所有出现在标题段之后的文字和其它内容都视为图例。 例如这一段文字以及下面的表格：

Symbol Meaning
Campground
Lake
Mountain 
footnote reference [1]_

.. [1] A footnote example linked to [1].

脚标，下面的例子中也可以使用 # 自动计数

footnote reference [1]

[1]A footnote example linked to [1].
 
citation reference [CIT2002]_

.. [CIT2002] A citation example.

文献引用，和脚标用法类似。

citation reference [CIT2002]

[CIT2002]A citation example.
 
- \*星号*

- \``代码符号``

- 反斜杠 \\

使用 backslash 显示那些特殊字符。

  • *星号*
  • ``代码符号``
  • 反斜杠 \
 
Lists:

- item 1. 第一项前和最后一项后必须各留出一空行.
- item 2. List 由 "*", "+", "-" 等符号引导。

- item 3. 中间各项之间可留空行也可省略.

  1. nested item 1. 此前又须留出一空行。数字型的list接
     受这几种格式：

     a. 阿拉伯数字 1, 2, 3 ...
     #. 大写或小写字母 A, B, ..., Z. a, b, ..., z.
     #. 大写或小写罗马数字 I, II, ... 或 i, ii, ...

Definition Lists: 词或变量

what
    Definition lists associate a term with a
    definition.

lines : string
    List of one-line strings without newlines.

Field Lists:

:Authors:
    Tony J. (Tibs) Ibbs,
    David Goodger

    (and sundry other good-natured folks)

:Version: 1.0 of 2001/08/08

:Dedication: To my father.

Option Lists:

-a file    command-line option "a"
--input=file    long options can also have arguments
/V    DOS/VMS-style options too

Lists:

  • item 1. 第一项前和最后一项后必须各留出一空行.
  • item 2. List 由 "*", "+", "-" 等符号引导。
  • item 3. 中间各项之间可留空行也可省略.
    1. nested item 1. 此前又须留出一空行。数字型接 受这几种格式：
      1. 阿拉伯数字 1, 2, 3 ...
      2. 大写或小写字母 A, B, ..., Z. a, b, ..., z.
      3. 大写或小写罗马数字 I, II, ... 或 i, ii, ...

Definition Lists: 词或变量

what
Definition lists associate a term with a definition.
lines : string
List of one-line strings without newlines.

Field Lists:

Authors:

Tony J. (Tibs) Ibbs, David Goodger

(and sundry other good-natured folks)
Version:

1.0 of 2001/08/08
Dedication:

To my father.

Option Lists:

-a file command-line option "a"
--input=file long options can also have arguments
/V DOS/VMS-style options too
 
.. code:: python

   def my_function():
       "just a test"
       print 8/2



.. gist:: 2395284

code: 可选参数 number-lines : [start line number] Nikola 现在已使用 rst 的 code 代替以前 Nikola 使用的 code-block 语法. 另外引用整个文件可以用 listing.

def my_function():
    "just a test"
    print 8/2

gist: 引用 GitHub 的 gist (效果略).

 
Literal Blocks:

::

  Whitespace, newlines, blank lines, and all kinds of
  markup is preserved by literal blocks.

Per-line quoting can also be used on unindented
literal blocks (顶格写时每行的 ``>`` 符号不可少)::

> Useful for quotes from email and
> for Haskell literate programming.

Block Quotes:

Block quotes 格式为相对前一行进行缩进，

    Block quotes 仅仅是缩进，并不会像 literal blocks
    或是 line blocks 那样完全照搬格式。例如这一段在渲
    染后的排版断行不会完全和原文一模一样。

        Nested block quotes.

Line Blocks: （注意渲染后的样式与普通文字一样）

| Line blocks are useful for addresses,
| verse, and adornment-free lists.

| Each new line begins with a
| vertical bar ("|").
|     Line breaks and initial indents
|     are preserved.
| Continuation lines are wrapped
  portions of long lines; they begin
  with spaces in place of vertical bars.

Doctest Blocks: 以 ``<<<`` 打头

>>> print "This is a doctest block."
This is a doctest block.

Literal Blocks:

Whitespace, newlines, blank lines, and all kinds of
markup is preserved by literal blocks.

Per-line quoting can also be used on unindented literal blocks (顶格写时每行的 > 符号不可少):

> Useful for quotes from email and
> for Haskell literate programming.

Block Quotes:

Block quotes 格式为相对前一行进行缩进，

Block quotes 仅仅是缩进，并不会像 literal blocks 或是 line blocks 那样完全照搬格式。例如这一段在渲 染后的排版断行不会完全和原文一模一样。

Nested block quotes.

Line Blocks: （注意渲染后的样式与普通文字一样）

Line blocks are useful for addresses,
verse, and adornment-free lists.
Each new line begins with a
vertical bar ("|").
Line breaks and initial indents
are preserved.
Continuation lines are wrapped portions of long lines; they begin with spaces in place of vertical bars.

Doctest Blocks: 以 <<< 打头

>>> print "This is a doctest block."
This is a doctest block.

**Admonitions**: 包括 "attention", "caution", "danger",
 "error", "hint", "important", "note", "tip", "warning"
 以及一般性的 "admonition"

.. DANGER::
   Beware killer rabbits!

.. admonition:: And, by the way...

   You can make up your own admonition too.

Admonitions: 包括 "attention", "caution", "danger", "error", "hint", "important", "note", "tip", "warning" 以及一般性的 "admonition"

!DANGER!

Beware killer rabbits!

And, by the way...

You can make up your own admonition too.

 
+------------+------------+-----------+
| Header 1   | Header 2   | Header 3  |
+============+============+===========+
| body row 1 | column 2   | column 3  |
+------------+------------+-----------+
| body row 2 | Cells may span columns.|
+------------+------------+-----------+
| body row 3 | Cells may  | - Cells   |
+------------+ span rows. | - contain |
| body row 4 |            | - blocks. |
+------------+------------+-----------+

=====  =====  ======
   Inputs     Output
------------  ------
  A      B    A or B
=====  =====  ======
False  False  False
True   False  True
False  True   True
True   True   True
=====  =====  ======

表格：

Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
body row 1 column 2 column 3
body row 2 Cells may span columns.
body row 3 Cells may span rows.
  • Cells
  • contain
  • blocks.
body row 4
Inputs Output
A B A or B
False False False
True False True
False True True
True True True 
.. csv-table:: Frozen Delights!
   :header: "Treat", "Quantity", "Description"
   :widths: auto
   :align: center

   "Albatross", 2.99, "On a stick!"
   "Crunchy Frog", 1.49, "If we took the bones
   out, it wouldn't be crunchy, now would it?"
   "Gannet Ripple", 1.99, "On a stick!"



.. list-table:: Frozen Delights!
   :widths: auto
   :header-rows: 1
   :stub-columns: 0
   :align: center

   * - Treat
     - Quantity
     - Description
   * - Albatross
     - 2.99
     - On a stick!
   * - Crunchy Frog
     - 1.49
     - If we took the bones out, it wouldn't be
       crunchy, now would it?
   * - Gannet Ripple
     - 1.99
     - On a stick!

csv-table (CSV Table):

Frozen Delights!
Treat Quantity Description
Albatross 2.99 On a stick!
Crunchy Frog 1.49 If we took the bones out, it wouldn't be crunchy, now would it?
Gannet Ripple 1.99 On a stick!

list-table (List Table):

Frozen Delights!
Treat Quantity Description
Albatross 2.99 On a stick!
Crunchy Frog 1.49 If we took the bones out, it wouldn't be crunchy, now would it?
Gannet Ripple 1.99 On a stick!

目录结构

目录用 contents 生成。本文的目录 (contents) 原代码如下 (参考 The Nikola Handbook Source 中的写法)：

.. class:: alert alert-info pull-right

.. contents::

侧边栏

Sidebar Title

Optional Sidebar Subtitle

Subsequent indented lines comprise the body of the sidebar, and are interpreted as body elements.

侧边栏由 sidebar 实现。右侧的侧边栏代码为：

.. sidebar:: Sidebar Title
  :subtitle: Optional Sidebar Subtitle

  Subsequent indented lines comprise
  the body of the sidebar, and are
  interpreted as body elements.

Nikola 常用语法

**Math**: 在 ``tags`` 中添加 ``mathjax`` 启用 LaTeX.

- inline math:

  Euler’s formula: :math:`e^{ix} = \cos x + i\sin x`

- displayed math:

  .. math::

     \int \frac{dx}{1+ax}=\frac{1}{a}\ln(1+ax)+C

Math: 在 tags 中添加 mathjax 启用 LaTeX.

  • inline math:

    Euler’s formula: \(e^{ix} = \cos x + i\sin x\)

  • displayed math:

    \begin{equation*} \int \frac{dx}{1+ax}=\frac{1}{a}\ln(1+ax)+C \end{equation*} 
**Media**: 可直接插入Vimeo, Youtute, Soundcloud.

.. youtube:: 8N_tupPBtWQ
   :align: center

.. vimeo:: 20241459
   :height: 240
   :width: 320

.. soundcloud:: 78131362

Media: 可直接插入Vimeo, Youtute, Soundcloud.
